body_html:
Hi,
I am having a similar issue when trying to run the retraining test (following https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/image_retraining):

ERROR: error loading package 'tensorflow/examples/image_retraining': Encountered error while reading extension file 'cuda/build_defs.bzl': no such package '@local_config_cuda//cuda': error loading package 'external': The repository named 'local_config_cuda' could not be resolved.

Have you been able to solve this issue, and how?

I'm using cuda 8.0, bazel 0.4.4, python 3.5.3 (also tried with 2.7).

Thanks a lot,
Best,
Nicolas

body:
Hi,
  I am having a similar issue when trying to run the retraining test (following https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/image_retraining):

ERROR: error loading package 'tensorflow/examples/image_retraining': Encountered error while reading extension file 'cuda/build_defs.bzl': no such package '@local_config_cuda//cuda': error loading package 'external': The repository named 'local_config_cuda' could not be resolved.

Have you been able to solve this issue, and how? 

I'm using cuda 8.0, bazel 0.4.4, python 3.5.3 (also tried with 2.7).

Thanks a lot,
Best,
Nicolas
